text: Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nde Fhe Bakɨme rotur muun saŋv wari fugɨp, nde ram mbui tɨvar muuŋrie? Nde zam muunga ŋaari ki. Guma mbe, ana Fhe Bakɨme rotu mbui ŋgava mbui. Mbevi, ana Fhe Bakɨmen buna muen gumgi gu mbigi khɨvav mbe nzuai. Mbevi, Fhe Bakɨme vhagi buna muen ana nɨɨŋgim, ana ne bun nzuai. Mbevi, ana harigi ŋgun kaman vhov buni suanga, harigi ne, ana nzuai buni domdorɨrga. Nde mba mbui bigi, nta zam sios havhari.
